Description: Limestone ostracon. Remains of 11 lines of text on recto and 13 lines on verso containing a letter/administrative document in form of a letter. Another 2 lines on the edge.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Egypt Exploration Fund (probably on the Excavation 1910-11)
Bibliographic references: Biedenkopf-Ziehner 2000a / Koptische Ostraka I: Ostraka aus dem Britischen Museum in London (138-145, pl.12)
Delattre 2002 / CR de O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II et O.Ashm.Copt. (p.332)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (82877) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/82877)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.Brit.Mus.Copt. II 11 (text edition abbreviation according to Oates et al 2001)
